00006 class Mesh(app.Application):
00007     def __init__(self, params, random):
00008         app.Application.__init__(self, params, random)

00010 #-------------------------------------------#
00011     def fitness(self, ind, user_feedback):
00012         '''
00013         Compute fitness.
00014         user_feedback is a list of the user's input,
00015         the list contents are ordered the same as the 
00016         feedback variable in the config yaml file.
00017         [best]
00018         '''
00019         best = user_feedback[0]
00020         subj = 0
00021         if ind.genome == best.genome:
00022             subj = self.geneLen
00023         else:
00024             subj += hamming(ind, best)
00025 
00026         ind.scalefit = ind.fitness = subj
00027 
00028 
00029 #-------------------------------------------#
00030     def draw(self, parentPanel, subset):
00031         '''
00032         Return a list of panels to be displayed to the user for evaluation.
00033         Use the arg parentPanel as the parent for each of the panels created.
00034         '''
00035         panels = []
00036         for i in xrange(len(subset)):
00037             data = self.decode(subset[i].genome)
00038             panels.append(gl.OpenGLPanel(parentPanel, i, data))
00039         return panels
00040 
00041 #-------------------------------------------#
00042     def report(self, pop, gen):
00043 
00044         best = max(pop)
00045         sumFit = reduce(lambda a,b: a + b.fitness, pop, 0)
00046             
00047         print '%i) Best Fit: %.2f, Avg Fit: %.2f' % (gen, best.fitness, sumFit/len(pop))
